content:
Play after making two successful consecutive melee Strikes against the same target with two different weapons.

The target takes [[/r 1d6[bleed]]] and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened 1} until the bleeding stops. If you are 7th level or higher, increase the bleed to [[/r 2d6[bleed]]]. If you are 12th level or higher, increase the bleed to [[/r 3d6[bleed]]].
name: Rending Swipe
